response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be $1,200,000 to us. However, considering your specific needs and the potential benefits it could bring to your company, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a price that reflects its true value to you. I kindly propose a transaction price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a competitive rate while maximizing my return on investment. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
